article_title: FTC's Pa. Merger Loss Puts Obamacare Defense On The Table
article_text:
FTC's Pa. Merger Loss Puts Obamacare Defense On The Table

Law360, New York (May 10, 2016, 10:02 PM ET) -- The Federal Trade Commission’s Monday failure to halt a Pennsylvania hospital merger could help health care providers in future merger cases because in a novel move, the judge described the Affordable Care Act as a factor that could help justify industry consolidation, experts say.



The so-called Obamacare defense was not the decisive factor in U.S. District Judge John E. Jones III’s decision denying a preliminary injunction to stop the merger of Penn State Hershey Medical Center and PinnacleHealth System. But in passages that are sure to...

To view the full article, register now.
